name: World Cup 2002: Group D Multiple Choice Quiz | FIFA World Cup | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
South Korea.

	South Korea won two and drew one of their matches in this group, beating Portugal along the way.

questions.text: South Korea vs Poland: who scored the first goal of the game?
questions.explanation:
Sun Hong Hwang (South Korea).

	The other goal of the game came from Sang Chul Yoo as South Korea wrapped up a 2-0 victory to send the host nation's fans wild.

questions.text: USA vs Portugal: what was the half-time score during this match?
questions.explanation:
USA 3 Portugal 1.

	Three goals in the first 36 minutes sealed a 3-2 win for USA.

questions.text: USA vs Portugal: there were two own-goals in this game, one for either team. Who scored them?
questions.explanation:
Jeff Agoos (USA) & Jorge Costa (Portugal).

	Jorge Costa scored an own-goal in the 29th minute to make the score 2-0 to USA, while Jeff Agoos scored his in the 71st minute to complete the 3-2 scoreline.

questions.text: South Korea vs USA: Brad Friedel saved a penalty during this game, but who from?
questions.explanation:
Eul Yong Lee.

	South Korea could have walked away with all three points but thanks to Brad Friedel, the game finished 1-1.

questions.text: Portugal vs Poland: Portugal made light work of a weak Polish side, but who scored an hat-trick?
questions.explanation:
Pauleta.

	Portugal ended the game with an easy 4-0 victory with Pauleta's goals coming in the 14th, 65th and 77th minutes, the other goal of the game was scored by Rui Costa with two minutes left.

questions.text: Portugal vs South Korea: how many players saw red for Portugal during this game?
questions.explanation:
2.

	Joao Pinto was sent-off for a two footed challenge on Ji Sung Park in the 27th minute, while Beto got his marching orders got his second yellow card in the 66th minute.

questions.text: Poland vs USA: Poland finally won a game in the group, but how many goals did they score?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Poland won the match 3-1, with Emmanuel Olisadebe, Pawel Kryszalowicz and Marcin Zewlakov scoring their goals, and Landon Donovan scoring in the 83rd minute for USA.

questions.text: Who did South Korea go on to meet in the second phase?
questions.explanation:
Italy.

	South Korea beat Italy in the second phase with a golden goal scored by Jung Hwan Ahn with three minutes of extra-time remaining.

questions.text: Who did USA, as runners-up of the group, go on to meet in the second phase?
questions.explanation:
Mexico.

	USA beat Mexico 2-0 in the second round with Brian McBride and Landon Donovan getting on the scoresheet.
